Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners

Class PlayerObjectiveCardListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners.Listener
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners.PlayerObjectiveCardListener
public class PlayerObjectiveCardListener extends Listener
This class represents a listener that handles updates related to a specific player's objective card. It sends the objective card the player had choose.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(GameModel model, String username)
      Extract from the game model the objective card the player had choose and sends it to all clients.
      Specified by:
      update in class Listener
      Parameters:
      model - The game model from which to extract the data,
      username - The username of the player whose play area is being updated.
